section.title: PostgreSQL Database Access.
section.para: This package offers an &ffi-pac;-based interface to &postgresql-link;. The package SQL (nicknamed POSTGRES and POSTGRESQL) is case-sensitive, so you would write (sql:PQconnectdb ...) when you need to call PQconnectdb().
section.simpara: When this module is present, &features-var; contains the symbol :POSTGRESQL.
section.para: See modules/postgresql/sql.lisp for a sample usage.
